Part 2: A cylindrical object with a tapered end, resembling a metallic tube. Create a new coordinate system for part 2. Extrude the sketch along its normal direction with an extrusion depth of 0.3462. You will obtain a cylindrical object with a tapered end resembling a metallic tube. **Final Model** Align and combine the two parts to create the final shape: a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole through its center.</description>
